_sText:
My first combat surf map! In this map, you start off in an isolated spawn point and fly to the arena. You then gain a lot of speed and try to maintain it whilst killing the enemies. Guns are spread across the map and the better ones are in harder to reach areas. Have fun! NOTE: This is a beta, if you encounter any bugs, PLEASE tell me! So I can improve it for the final release. I know that a bit of the shading is messed up. If you know how to fix it tell me :D Textures by me Amazing skybox by the one and only Karatekaefer Thanks Heres me getting owned on my own map (please note that this video was taken in an alpha version of the map so it looks different)
WeGame.com - CS Source Videos
Now in Beta2! New version has many new secrets, fixed ramps, new boosters and much more :)
